body_text: Personally, I prefer to use the static keyword, so the propTypes are defined right in the component However, the conventions used for other components uses the [class].propTypes = {...} business, so if I used static here I'd feel the need to go through and update the rest of the code - but I'd prefer to do that in another branch/PR
body: Personally, I prefer to use the `static` keyword, so the propTypes are defined right in the component However, the conventions used for other components uses the `[class].propTypes = {...}` business, so if I used `static` here I'd feel the need to go through and update the rest of the code - but I'd prefer to do that in another branch/PR
body_html: Personally, I prefer to use the static keyword, so the propTypes are defined right in the component However, the conventions used for other components uses the [class].propTypes = {...} business, so if I used static here I'd feel the need to go through and update the rest of the code - but I'd prefer to do that in another branch/PR
